data.title: FC Khust live score, schedule & player stats
data.meta_description: FC Khust live score, fixtures, player ratings and statistics.
data.text:
FC Khust live scores, players, season schedule and today’s results are available on Sofascore.

FC Khust next match

FC Khust will play the next match against FC Epicentr Dunaivtsi on Aug 25, 2024, 10:00:00 AM UTC in Persha Liha.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow FC Epicentr Dunaivtsi vs FC Khust live score, standings, minute by minute updated live results and match statistics.

We may have video highlights with goals and news for some FC Khust matches, but only if they play their match in one of the most popular football leagues.

FC Khust previous match

FC Khust previous match was against Nyva Ternopil in Persha Liha, the match ended with result 2 - 3 (Nyva Ternopil won the match).

FC Khust fixtures tab is showing the last 100 football matches with statistics and win/draw/lose icons.

There are also all FC Khust scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

FC Khust performance and form graph is a Sofascore unique algorithm that we are generating from the team's last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help predict future FC Khust matches.

Current FC Khust players

Forward: Mykhailo Flyashko Midfielder: Dmytro Dyyanchuk Defender: Bohdan Pavlych, Dániel Bánik, Konstantin Kolchin, Vasil Vasilinec, Robert Philip Goalkeeper: Vladyslav Ryabenko

The current FC Khust roster, stats and player performance can be found on this page.

There are also statistics for each player in all competitions with all total played and started matches, minutes played, number of goals scored, number of cards and much more.

FC Khust top scorers list is updated live during every match.

You can click on players from the roster above and see available personal information such as nationality, date of birth, height, preferred foot, position, player value, transfer history etc.
